analysis.description:
NRB_Tokens.registerToken (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#139-160) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_token).balanceOf(address(this)) == 0)

Reentrancy in NRB_Tokens.registerAndValidateToken (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#133-138):
	External calls:
	- registerToken(_token,_name,_symbol,_decimals,_nextRecord) (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#138)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#138)

Reentrancy in NRB_Tokens.registerToken (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#139-160):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_token).totalSupply() > 0) (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#144-145)
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_token).balanceOf(address(this)) == 0) (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#145-147)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#147-148)
	- tokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#148-149)

NRB_Tokens.sendFLC (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#163-175) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(FLC_address).transfer(user,flc) (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#172-174)

Reentrancy in NRB_Tokens.registerToken (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#139-160):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_token).totalSupply() > 0) (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#144-145)
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_token).balanceOf(address(this)) == 0) (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#145-147)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- tokenlist (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e9eedb83f89c2724d76715a0edabd43549b83ba.sol#157-158)
